name: Ground Death
types: The Seven Warlords of the Sea/Baroque Works
text:
Main You may rest 2 of your DON!! cards: Negate the effect of up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 5 or less during this turn. 
Counter If you have 10 or more cards in your trash, up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +4000 power during this battle.

effect.text: Negate the effect of up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 5 or less during this turn.
If you have 10 or more cards in your trash, up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +4000 power during this battle.
targets: up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards
conditions: you have 10 or more cards in your trash
